channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Suspected food poisoning kills mom, 2 kids at popular tourist site
item.description: Two children and their mother have died after eating street food at a popular Istanbul tourist site, Turkish officials said.

item.title: 11/13: CBS Evening News

item.title: Calif. wildfire forces evacuations as storm threatens mudslides in south
item.description: A Pacific storm could help California crews battle the dangerous Pack Fire in Mono County, but it could also wreak havoc on fire-charred communities f...

item.title: She wanted to keep her son in his school district. It was more challenging than it seemed
item.description: When families are evicted, kids’ schooling is often disrupted. Many evicted families go from living in a school district that spends more money on stu...

item.title: FDA's plan to boost cheaper copycat drugs could stall at patent office
item.description: The FDA's push for lower-cost medicines looks good on paper, but the patent office under President Trump may be going in the opposite direction.

item.title: Epstein appeared to offer political advice on dealing with Trump in 2018: Emails
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein was still actively shopping his political and financial acumen with major power players on the international stage in 2018.

item.title: Shaved bald: A Rastafari fight for justice at Supreme Court
item.description: Devout Rastafarians say a case involving religious freedom behind bars highlights a history of discrimination and lack of accountability.

item.title: Latest opioid settlement plan with OxyContin maker Purdue and Sackler family getting few objections
Epstein emails reveal enduring ties with influential figures even after his sex crime conviction
WATCH: Leonardo DiCaprio eulogizes primatologist Jane Goodall
item.description: DiCaprio paid tribute to Goodall in a moving eulogy at the late environmentalist's funeral service on Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: First lady Melania Trump speaks at signing of 'Fostering the Future' executive order
item.description: The executive order signed Thursday focused on expanding financial and educational opportunities for young people transitioning out of foster care.

item.title: WATCH: Former ABC News senior correspondent Jim Avila dies
item.description: Jim Avila, former ABC News senior correspondent and “20/20” correspondent, passed away after a long illness.
